sentence: The Melville Mariot have alwAys treated us as family every year

Me and my family had an amazing time visiting family and staying in this hotel while doing it Tim the front desk manager was one of the most amazing workers I have ever seen he gave us directions to the airshow we meet some of the pilots while we were there and the food at Bistro 49 was amazing
I look forward to returning for future business AND would happily bring my family and friends
We are happy to have found a really nice hotel with staff really committed to making our stay a fabulous one it made our anniversary trip that much more special
Food was great bar service was good and the staff was super friendly and always acknowledged our group event
We will make the Mariot Melville the destination for our annual family stay on Long Island
Stayed recently for a family event
Hotel was filled with families of sport tournaments
the one thing I am looking in a hotel on these trips is for it to be clean quiet a easy to get in and out of and hopefully good food
Not the hotels fault but was a bit unpleasant seeing that my fiancé and I got a room for a quiet getaway

Screaming and yelling till 130 am 12 hours of children and adaults running and screaming in the halls on 2 floors playing hide n seek 40 teen girls and boys partying in 1 room constantly spilling into the hallway
Hotel was not bad but the security is horrible there is a big group of children and teenagers were running away the hallway an
On check in there were children running and screaming all over the hotel making it impossible to hear the screaming could be heard in the hotel rooms as our family checked into three separate rooms
I found the lack of professionalism and disregard for those visiting with the church appalling especially since there were large groups at the bar being quite rowdy
